elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Answer the questions on the factual text "Mobility".

elements.name: question1
elements.title: What is meant by the term mobility?
elements.correctAnswer: Mobility refers to the movement of people and goods.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: List different means of transportation.
elements.correctAnswer: On foot, bicycle, skateboard, motorcycle, car, bus, train, streetcar, boat, plane, etc.

elements.name: question3
elements.title: How does private transport differ from public transport?
elements.correctAnswer: Individual transport refers to the use of private means of transportation (car, bicycle, etc.) to get from one place to another. Public transport, on the other hand, refers to the use of means of transportation such as trains, buses, streetcars, etc., which can be used by everyone, i.e. the general public.
